description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) recognises the importance of their employees’ psychological health and wellness. To address the situation, the CFIA has identified the need of a Commercially Available web-hosted Platform containing an expert-led, fully bilingual (English and French) extensive video library and accompanying services. The video-based library will need to offer a full range of health and wellness subjects that will enable CFIA employees and their families to access expert information anytime from any device.

full_summary:
**Expert-Led Mental Health Video Library**
=====================================================

**Tender Announcement**
-------------------

**Reference Number**: cb-5512-83012570

**Solicitation Number**: 2023-00924

**Publication Date**: May 12, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: June 9, 2023 (14:00:00 NCET)

**Contract Status**: Exposed

**Description**
---------------

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites contractors to submit a proposal for the provision of an expert-led mental health video library and accreditation services. The aim of this project is to support the psychological health and wellness of CFIA employees and their families.

**Key Services Required**
---------------------------

*   A commercially available, web-hosted video library with access to expert-led health and wellness content in both English and French.
*   Accompanying services to support employees and their families.

**Industry Codes**
-------------------

*   UNSPC: 85101700
    *   Health administration services
*   Industry Category: SRVTGD

**Request for Proposal**
-------------------------

This is a competitive procurement, with proposals to be evaluated based on lowest price.

**Important Dates**
-------------------

*   Tender closing date: June 9, 2023 (14:00:00 NCET)
*   Expected contract start date: October 1, 2023
*   Expected contract end date: March 31, 2024

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   Name: Catherine Clairoux
*   Email: [catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (343) 596-9265

**Attachments**
----------------

*   A set of additional documents, including amendment documents, is available on the Canada Buy Service website (<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/>).
